Package userinterface

Class UITextField

java.lang.Object
userinterface.Frame
userinterface.DocumentCell
userinterface.UITextField
public class UITextField
extends DocumentCell
A class to represent text fields in the UI layer.

  • Constructor Details

    • UITextField

      public UITextField​(int x, int y, int width, int text_size, java.lang.String text) throws IllegalDimensionException
      Create a UITextField based on the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      x - : x position on this UITextField in the window.
      y - : y position of this UITextField in the window.
      width - : the width of this UITextField.
      text_size - : The height of this UITextField.
      text - : The text attribute of this UITextField.
      Throws:
      IllegalDimensionException

  • Method Details

    • Render

      public void Render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Render this UITextField. => Get information about the width of the text in the textFieldFont. => Set the color, normalFont and then draw the string on the window.
      Overrides:
      Render in class DocumentCell
      Parameters:
      g - : The graphics to be updated.

    • getMaxWidth

      public int getMaxWidth()
      The max width of a UITextField is the width of the string.
      Overrides:
      getMaxWidth in class DocumentCell
      Returns:
      1: this is always equal to 1.
